title: Knightboat: The Crime Solving Boat
description: Michael Knight fights the bad guys with his self-aware crime solving boat. Justice is just a canal, inlet, or fjord away.
quote: Oh, no! They’re headed for land.
altHero: Michael Knight driving Knightboat across the water
alt1: Michael Knight in a vest holding a steering wheel
alt3: three bad guys riding jetskis with backpacks full of starfish
